column3: Price variability coefficient estimation over less than 0.2
column4: Price variability coefficient estimation less than 0.5
column5: Price variability coefficient estimation less than 1
column6: Price variability coefficient estimation more than 1

column3: Very homogenous (physical emissions factors with base uncertainty less than 20%)
column4: Homogenous (physical emissions factors with base uncertainty less than 50%)
column5: Heterogenous (physical emissions factors with base uncertainty less than 100%)
column6: Very heterogenous (physical emissions factors with base uncertainty more than 100%)
